page.title: 04MY HEALTH
page.content: I am 10 years old and attend{All} {Saints' School}in Shildon.My hospital is 6 kilometres away in{Bishop} {Auckland}which is the nearest large town to Shildon.I started to go to the hospital when I was a couple of months old for check-ups as I have a heart murmur.I used to be weighed and have my height checked at the{General} {Hospital}each month. I was about 3 when I stopped going.Then I started to get colds every fortnight so I went to the local GP.He told me that I had paler hands than normal and that I would have to go into the General Hospital for tests for anaemia.That was when they found that I had a heart complaint.They gave me treatment and now I am much better.I can play and take part in sport at school and go swimming with the rest of the class.
